title: Data Protection Law : Sri Lanka Young Journalists Association seeks UN attention
content: The Sri Lanka Young Journalists Association has requested the UN human rights chief Michelle Bachelet to study Sri Lankaâ€™s proposed data protection law.The Sri Lanka Young Journalists Association has raised concerns over the Personal Data Protection Bill that was tabled in Parliament last month.The request to the UN human rights chief comes days ahead of the UN Human Rights Council sessions that are to begin on the 28th of this month.
